form.SN:
v ameriški angleščini pišemo
shoveling, shoveled
.

sense.def:
A shovel
je orodje, s katerim dvigujemo in premetavamo prst, premog ali sneg.

To shovel earth, coal, or snow
pomeni z lopato dvigati prst, premog ali sneg in ga metati drugam.

seg.quote: She helped us shovel the snow off the front path.

sense.def:
To shovel something somewhere
pomeni nekam potisniti veliko količino tiste stvari.

seg.quote: They were shovelling food into their mouths.
